response.overview: This HBO "On Location" comedy special was filmed at the Van Wezel Performance Center in Sarasota, Florida and features Myron Cohen at his very best. Cohen's career has been established on his observations of life, which he fine tunes into wonderful comedic episodes. His trademark deadpan delivery, which gives way to the arched eyebrow and closed eye, have become the highlight of his stories, as much as the punch-lines themselves.
response.title: On Location: Myron Cohen Revisited
